edu.stanford.cs.pptx.code

Class PPCodeDisplaySlide

  • Object
    • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.PPSlide
      • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.code.PPCodeDisplaySlide

  • public class PPCodeDisplaySlide
extends PPSlide
    This class defines a slide that can display a step-by-step trace of a program.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PPCodeDisplaySlide()
      Creates a new PPCodeTraceSlide object.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • PPCodeDisplaySlide

        public PPCodeDisplaySlide()
        Creates a new PPCodeTraceSlide object.

    • Method Detail

      • setFont

        public void setFont(Font font)
        Sets the font for the code box.
        Parameters:
        font - The font for the code box

      • setFont

        public void setFont(String str)
        Sets the font for the code box. In this version of setFont, the font is expressed as a string in the form 
            "family-style-size"
        Parameters:
        str - A string representing the font

      • setOldCode

        public PPCodeImage setOldCode(String[] code)
        Sets the old code. If a slide contains both new and old code, the old code must be set first.
        Parameters:
        code - The code from the old code page
        Returns:
        The PPCodeImage for the old code

      • setNewCode

        public PPCodeImage setNewCode(String[] code)
        Sets the new code. If a slide contains both new and old code, the old code must be set first.
        Parameters:
        code - The code from the new code page
        Returns:
        The PPCodeImage for the new code

      • addBackgroundMasks

        public void addBackgroundMasks()
        Adds background masks to the top and bottom of the slide. These masks make it possible to scroll code images out of the window without having them appear on the screen.
